name: DELETED
short_description:
Starvax Me.Te.Or. player is a customized media player build on QT5 framework, specific for light and music management during a live stage show. It is used by our small theater for children education. It is made up by: 
- a viewer for the script that scrolls down automatically and has hyperlinks that trigger a sound track or a light change 
- a media player that stops execution at the end of the track (instead of starting next track) 
- a light control that supports 12 DMX light channels with presets (only working with a specific USB/DMX device) - an automation system that allows firing tracks and light with given delay.
summary: A media player cut for stage playback
